title: Calories in Taco Time Taco
meta_description: Explore calories in taco time items like the classic beef soft taco (about 220 kcal), with full macros, variations, and FAQs for fast-food nutrition tracking.
assumptions: Standard beef soft taco from Taco Time: flour tortilla, seasoned ground beef, cheddar cheese, lettuce, mild sauce; no extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact recipe, portion size, and customizations. Check Taco Time's official menu or app for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Taco Time beef soft taco provides ~220 kcal, 11 g protein, and 24 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food menus.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Taco Time soft taco?
faqs.a: About 220 kcal for one beef soft taco.

faqs.q: What are the macros for calories in taco time tacos?
faqs.a: Per soft taco: 24 g carbs, 11 g protein, 9 g fat.

faqs.q: Are Taco Time tacos high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 500 mg sodium per soft taco due to seasoning and cheese.

faqs.q: Calories in taco time crisp vs soft taco?
faqs.a: Crisp tacos are similar at ~200-250 kcal; soft are slightly higher from the flour tortilla.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in taco time orders?
faqs.a: Opt for chicken, skip cheese/sauce, or choose fresco-style for ~100-150 kcal savings.
